participant_1.background:
My siblings are my favorite people because they are always there for me and we have so much fun together.
I sometimes forget to take care of myself because I am too busy.
i work in retail.
i traveled around the world in a boat.
i like being by myself.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy the fresh taste of my home-grown vegetables.
i like crocheting.
my favorite band is imagine dragons.
I start my morning with a walk around the neighborhood to get some fresh air and see what's going on at the local shops.
i have survived near death experiences.

content.text: Hello! What is your favorite thing about yourself?
I am very resourceful and can usually figure out how to do things on my own.  What about you?
I like my siblings. They are always there for me and we have a lot of fun together.
Siblings are the best!  Do you have any other hobbies?
I like being by myself and I crochet.  What do you like to do?
I like to go for walks around my neighborhood to get some fresh air and see what's going on.  I also like to crochet.  Do you have any other hobbies?
I like to cook and travel.  What are your favorite bands?
I like Imagine Dragons and the Eagles.  Have you ever had any near death experiences?
I once fell out of a tree when I was a kid.  Have you ever had any?
Yes, I have been in a few car accidents.  How are you doing today?
I am doing well, thanks for asking!  How are you today?
I am doing great!  I am excited to start crocheting a new blanket.
